Content.Text:
<MYNAME>, you're here, right? I'm coming
in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. If you've got some time
then come out with me again. I'll make
some time for you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on, let's go.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, that breeze sure does feel good!
I've been worked to the bone recently
thinking of new hairstyles!
<PAGE>
I do prefer being busy, but it's also
nice to take a break sometimes!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know why I became a stylist?
Let me see... if you ask me as cutely as
you can, I might tell you!
I'm too embarrassed to do that!
I'll give it a shot.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You're the one who wanted to know
all about me! There's no helping some
people, is there.
<PAGE>
Tell me, then, why are you running a
farm out here?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I see. Your parents loved that land.
Your parents still mean a lot to you,
don't they <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So? You want to know why I became a
stylist?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
B-A-D luck, honey bun. I told you to ask
me as cutely as you can! You've missed
the boat on that one.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You told me of your own free will! You
can't expect give-and-take all of the
time!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll tell you about it sometime.
I'd better be getting back. Catch you
later, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hummm not quite there yet. Again.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
A little cuter. You're almost there.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's not bad, coming from you <MYNAME>.
Pretty good overall, actually. I'll tell
you everything.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mother and sister both had really
long hair, but didn't know what to do
with it. So I started helping them out.
<PAGE>
As my skills increased other women in
the neighborhood started to ask me to
style their hair, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Keeping them happy spread word of my
talents further, and more and more women
started to come for my help.
<PAGE>
That led to me opening my salon, and
here we are.
<PAGE>
I almost scare myself, having reached
such a level of proficiency without
being taught by anyone at all!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hairstyle, clothing and makeup... your
appearance has a far bigger impact on
others than maybe you'd like to think.
<PAGE>
A stylist has the power to completely
change the impression someone gives.
It's quite a thrilling profession!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wow, look at all the info you plugged me
for. I don't normally talk that much.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You enjoyed my back story? That's great,
<MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd better be getting back to the
present, anyway! See you, <MYNAME>. Let's
talk again soon.
